subtask:

(3) Close the bottom cabinet.

code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 1: Open the bottom cabinet
    bottom_cabinet_no_top_spojpj_0 = registry(env,"bottom_cabinet_no_top_spojpj_0")
    open(robot, bottom_cabinet_no_top_spojpj_0)
    donothing(env)
